price: When it is said to them, “What has your Lord sent down?” They say, “Ancient fables!”
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
